sentences.sContent: I am happy enough to pay my respects to Streep, who even came out into the garden for a quick fag with us, but pay respect to the woman she portrays?
sentences.sContent_eng: I am happy enough to pay my respects to Streep, who even came out into the garden for a quick fag with us, but pay respect to the woman she portrays?
sentences.sCn: 我很高兴向斯特里普表示我的尊敬，她甚至在快节奏的劳累之后，还跟我们一起出现在花园里，可是，是向她所饰演的角色表示尊敬吗？

words.tran: 使劳累，努力地工作（fag的过去式和过去分词形式）

trans.tranOther: to become or cause to become exhausted by hard toil or work
